unnormalised: My son, Rohan, prepped like crazy for his Class 10th boards. He was burning the midnight oil, solving sample papers till 2:00 AM some nights. He aimed for 90%+, especially in Maths & Science. The pressure was immense, with coaching classes and all. Finally, results day came. He scored 88%, a B grade in his English paper, but got an A+ in every other subject! He was slightly disappointed, but ultimately happy he got into a good school for 11th grade.
normalised: My son, Rohan, prepped like crazy for his Class tenth boards. He was burning the midnight oil, solving sample papers till two AM some nights. He aimed for ninety percent plus, especially in Maths and Science. The pressure was immense, with coaching classes and all. Finally, results day came. He scored eighty eight percent, a B grade in his English paper, but got an A plus in every other subject! He was slightly disappointed, but ultimately happy he got into a good school for eleventh grade.
